deadlines.content: Be inspired by the more than 130 curated sessions of fantastically diverse topics. See you at EuroPython 2023!
While waiting for the 2022 cut videos, catch up on 3-full-day EuroPython 2022 live stream from the playlist.
Meet the amazing volunteers who spent countless hours & poured endless love into making EuroPython 2022!
